channel.title: Need Client Help
channel.description: Hello, I'm having some slight problems with my client. I've downloaded it. However, i need to set the IP to 0.0.0.0 to code my source. But i cannot do that because i can't log into my client because of the invalid IP. So, I was wondering if anyone here could change that for me. I've tried already. If you know how to do this then please comment below.

item.title: Need Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Top_Glitch Top Glitch
item.description:
@Top_Glitch wrote:

That wasn’t like that in mine. So, I’ve changed it to this…

public final void init() // settings { try {

anInt957 = 0;
anInt958 = 0;
method52(true);
aBoolean959 = true;
signlink.storeid = 32;
signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost());
setserver(“0.0.0.0”, “43594”);
method2(503, false, 765);

    }</blockquote>

Read full topic

item.title: Need Client Help
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

I’m not sure, but maybe this?

public final void init() { try { anInt957 = 0; anInt958 = 0; method52(true); aBoolean959 = true; signlink.storeid = 32; signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); setserver("orb-pkz.no-ip.org", "43594"); method2(503, false, 765); } catch (Exception exception) { return; } }

the “set server” is “IP” “PORT”…

This is in Client.java in the client folder.

Hope it helps :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2009, 02:51:03 am[/size][hr]For example, I would change it too

public final void init() { try { anInt957 = 0; anInt958 = 0; method52(true); aBoolean959 = true; signlink.storeid = 32; signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); setserver("0.0.0.0", "43594"); method2(503, false, 765); } catch (Exception exception) { return; } }

Read full topic
